description:
The 8th Unit destroys the Ingelmian base in the Gatar mountains.  For their next mission they go to resupply at Bellhals,  and enjoy a short rest.  Jamie and Tokimune stay behind, while everyone else is out, to update the Argevollen.  Meanwhile, Richthofen can be seen in a Bellhals port district...
Source: crunchyroll
